name: AUDIENCEX
tagline: Marketing to the Power of X
description: AUDIENCEX is the largest unified digital media buying platform that delivers end-to-end digital solutions for brands and agencies. Our mission is to provide intelligent strategy and dynamic innovation solutions for performance-driven advertisers. We offer seamless access to 18 enterprise-level programmatic, search and social platforms, proprietary data-driven campaign planning technology & strategy, creative services, and white-glove customer service.
